title: FRQ Score
stimulusHtml:
General Considerations

For Task A, the response must correctly describe the role of the Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC).

For Task B, the response must correctly explain how Congress can affect how the SEC acts in the role described in Task A.

For Task C, the response must explain how the process of selecting a new commissioner illustrates oversight and accountability in the bureaucracy.
descriptions: The responses accomplish none of the tasks set by the question.
The response accomplishes one of the tasks set by the question.
The response accomplishes two of the tasks set by the question. For a student to earn a point for B they must first earn the A point.
The response accomplishes three of the tasks set by the question. For a student to earn a point for B they must first earn the A point.
